verses.t: And Hiram{H2438} king{H4428} of Tyre{H6865} sent{H7971} his servants{H5650} unto Solomon{H8010}; for he had heard{H8085} that they had anointed{H4886} him king{H4428} in the room of his father{H1}: for Hiram{H2438} was ever{H3117} a lover{H157} of David{H1732}.Hiram: also called, Huram
And Solomon{H8010} sent{H7971} to Hiram{H2438}, saying{H559},

And it came to pass, when Hiram{H2438} heard{H8085} the words{H1697} of Solomon{H8010}, that he rejoiced{H8055} greatly{H3966}, and said{H559}, Blessed{H1288} be Lordthe {H3068} this day{H3117}, which hath given{H5414} unto David{H1732} a wise{H2450} son{H1121} over this great{H7227} people{H5971}.
